1: <pb/>Max c'oli k'anjab cham Job junelxa axca ti':
2: <pb/><t>Matawal chi je' in meltzoj junelxa axca jun tiempoal yalantok yet caw wal taynebil in yuj Dios.</t>
3: <t>A yet tzektebil in yuj Cham, chi je' wec' xol k'ekk'inal.</t>
4: <t>A wal yet tol caw wal tec'an in wali, a yet tu' txequel is watx'c'ulal Dios yiban tzet ayin.</t>
5: <t>A ton yet tu' ayc'al ec' Cham chi je' yuj masanil wetok; ajun eb wuninal chi ayji ec' wetok.</t>
6: <t>A yet tu', xiwil leche max yak' no' in wacax c'al no' in chiwo; a wawoj oliva comonxac'al chi ch'ibaj xolak ch'en.</t>
7: <t>A yet max quin apnic'al bay puertail conob, chin ay chotan xol eb yajaw,</t>
8: <t>a yet chin yilon eb ach'ej, chi el eb yul in be; axa eb ichamtak winak, chi aj lecan eb yet chin yilon eb.</t>
9: <t>Toltax eb mimek winak chi bek eb k'anjabi, chi tx'ox eb yechel yet chi tz'inji ay anima.</t>
10: <t>A eb yajawil conob, chi yiaytek eb yul is nuk', c'amxa tzet chi yal eb.</t>
11: <pb/><t>A yet chin yilon eb anima c'al yaben eb tzet chi wala', caw wal max in yic'al aj can eb c'al yalon eb watx' k'anej win.</t>
12: <t>Yujtol ayin ti' max in colwaj bay eb c'amxa is mam c'amxa is txutx c'al yetok bay eb meba', a ton juntzan tu' c'am mac chi colon xol yailal.</t>
13: <t>A eb tol lananxa cami max yal eb yuj diosal ayin; chi tzalojbi aj c'ul eb xal tol camnakxa yichamil yuj in colwal.</t>
14: <t>A tojolal c'al ikemal wet wal yayji oc ayin ti', axca tol in pichil yayji oc masanil c'ual.</t>
15: <t>Max in quetzic' eb c'am chi uj yilwi, max in colwaj c'apax bay eb palta yayji yakan.</t>
16: <t>Axca wal mamej in bay eb ay wal is cawxinakil, max in colwaj bay eb tx'ok conobal yin watx'ji el is k'anej eb.</t>
17: <t>Max wiel yikbej eb lanan yetnewi anima, cax max in coloncan el eb ayoc yul k'ab eb.</t>
18: <pb/><t>Ayin ti' max in na tol lajan wal ok yun bisil in c'ual axca wal arena, yinxa ichamil ok yun in cam bay cajan in.</t>
19: <t>Lajan in wal axca junok te te' tol awbil bay is ti' junok a' aej, axa yin is k'ablak chi low yal ak'bal yet ak'balil.</t>
20: <t>A in mimanbilal ac'ala'c'al ok beytok, c'am bak'in ok pax wip yin in colon in ba waloni.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Masanil anima max taynej yab tzet max wala', cax tz'inc'al ·∫çi eb yet max yaben eb in nabal.</t>
22: <t>A yet max lajwi in k'anjabi, tok ay mactxel chi cayec'neni. A in k'anej watx'c'al chi yab eb.</t>
23: <t>Yetok wal masanil c'ul eb chi chaon eb yabej, axca wal jechbanen jayoc nab yet waresma.</t>
24: <t>A yet chin tzewi yetok eb, ijan c'am chi yaoc eb yin c'ul ta yel, toxac'al t'anan oc eb win yuj chin tzalojbi yetok eb.</t>
25: <t>Max wawal oc wikbej nan xol eb, cax max in naon tzet yetal yowalil chi yun eb. Max wut in ba axca wal junok rey tol ayoc satak is soldado. A yet ayoc eb yin cusc'ulal, ayin ti' max in mimanc'ulnej eb.</t>
